Example shape: {"query": "{ books { id title } }", "variables": {}}
TODO: Write a query that uses the variable $id: ID! to fetch a single book by id. Include id, title, genre, year, author { name } in the selection set. Set variables to {"id": "b1"}.

TODO: Write a mutation using variables $title: String!, $genre: String!, $year: Int!, $authorId: ID! that calls addBook and returns id, title, genre, year, author { name }. Set variables to sample values.
TODO: Write a query using variable $genre: String! that calls booksByGenre and returns id, title, author { name }. Set variables to {"genre": "Programming"}.
